unnormalised: **Bollywood Bonanza: Your Guide to Navigating the Chaos**
normalised: Bollywood Bonanza: Your Guide to Navigating the Chaos

unnormalised: Mumbai, India – Bollywood's churning out more films than a chole bhature vendor on a Sunday! Brace yourselves, cinephiles, because your wallets are about to weep.
normalised: Mumbai, India – Bollywood's churning out more films than a chole bhature vendor on a Sunday! Brace yourselves, cinephiles, because your wallets are about to weep.

unnormalised: First up, "Prem's Promise," a romantic saga starring heartthrob Varun Dhawan, releases on 26/07/2024. Early reviews suggest it's 3 hrs of pure *pyaar*, with a runtime longer than a Delhi traffic jam.
normalised: First up, "Prem's Promise," a romantic saga starring heartthrob Varun Dhawan, releases on twenty sixth july two thousand and twenty four. Early reviews suggest it's three hours of pure pyaar, with a runtime longer than a Delhi traffic jam.

unnormalised: Then there's "Dilliwala Detective," a crime caper hitting screens on 09/08/2024. Starring Naseeruddin Shah as a chai-loving private eye, expect twists and turns sharper than your mother-in-law's tongue. Initial predictions: Rs. 100 crore opening weekend, minimum!
normalised: Then there's "Dilliwala Detective," a crime caper hitting screens on ninth august two thousand and twenty four. Starring Naseeruddin Shah as a chai-loving private eye, expect twists and turns sharper than your mother-in-law's tongue. Initial predictions: rupee one hundred crore opening weekend, minimum!

unnormalised: But the big one? "Mughal Mayhem," a historical epic directed by Karan Johar, drops on Diwali, 01/11/2024. Sources say it's got more drama than a family wedding and costumes that cost more than my entire ancestral property. Prepare for a cinematic *dhamaka* folks! Show times start at 09:00 hrs sharp. Avoid the queues; book your tickets now, warna *line mein lage raho!*
normalised: But the big one? "Mughal Mayhem," a historical epic directed by Karan Johar, drops on Diwali, first november two thousand and twenty four. Sources say it's got more drama than a family wedding and costumes that cost more than my entire ancestral property. Prepare for a cinematic dhamaka folks! Show times start at zero nine hundred hours sharp. Avoid the queues; book your tickets now, warna line mein lage raho!
